definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: And encipher his nature into mine.
Landmine ? Want to do the hip twist ?
The bridge went up with a roar when the mine was exploded.
sentences.chinese: 地雷爆炸时，那座桥轰然一声被炸毁了。

sentences.english: Experience of Zhao shake day arrived the might of landmine, be determined learns to make thunder technology secretly.
sentences.chinese: 赵震天见识到了地雷的威力，决意偷学造雷技术。

sentences.english: This game has watermelon bowling, two bonus games potatoes mine warfare.
sentences.chinese: 本游戏有西瓜保龄球，土豆地雷战两个奖励游戏。

sentences.english: Some 44 million antipersonnel mines have been destroyed from stockpiles.
sentences.chinese: 库存的杀伤人员地雷已有4400万个被销毁了。

sentences.english: All the roads leading to the city had been mined.
sentences.chinese: 所有通往这座城市的道路都埋设了地雷。

sentences.english: There we discovered the biggest minefield in the farm- there were cow dung everywhere!
sentences.chinese: 里头有五十多头牛，还有全农场最大的“地雷”场。

sentences.english: The cozy way is always mined.
sentences.chinese: 好走的路总已被布上地雷。

sentences.english: Fixed game crashing when using a scout to attack Vasari mines.
sentences.chinese: 固定使用时游戏崩溃的球探攻击瓦萨利地雷。

sentences.english: Demining or mine clearance is the process of removing either land mines, or naval mines, from an area.
sentences.chinese: 排雷或扫雷是从一个区域清除地雷或水雷的过程。

sentences.english: If the mine goes off, we will win the awards-micro-point software.
sentences.chinese: 如果地雷爆炸，我们就会中奖，赢得微点软件。

sentences.english: The simple way is always mined.
sentences.chinese: 好走的路总已被布上地雷。

sentences.english: Maybe they are buried too deep to explode if you step on one.
sentences.chinese: 如果你踩到了地雷，可能不会爆炸，因为埋得深。

sentences.english: After this human beings take over and defuse and remove the mine.
sentences.chinese: 然后便由人类接手，拆去雷管并移除地雷。

sentences.english: The team was responsible for clearing minefields in the war zone.
sentences.chinese: 这个小组负责清理战区的地雷阵。

definition: to install (water pipes, landmines etc) underground
